title: Champion&Skin shards disappeared in alpha client
body: I updated the alpha client yesterday, and I found out all my champion&asking shards in hextech crafting store and some important materials disappeared! I'm not sure how long it will take to fix this bug, but I just wanna know does anybody occured the same issue?

replies.body: Sometimes restarting the client will fix it, otherwise your best bet is to simply switch back to the legacy client until the display updates properly. Rest assured all the materials are still there, there are just some intermittent display issues for crafting in the new client.
